text: Iye ali kupereka chitsanzo chokhudza inu nomwe. Kodi inu muli nawo akapolo amene amakhala anzanu pa zinthu zimene takupatsani ndipo kuti mumagawana nawo zinthuzo mofanana ndiponso mumawaopa iwo monga momwe mumaoperana? Mmenemo ndi mmene timasiyanitsira chiphunzitso chathu kwa anthu amene amazindikira
